source:
--D_CUSTOMERS_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- 1. Rejestracja bronze_customers jako tymczasowy widok
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/customers/'
);

-- 2. Rejestracja bronze_countries jako tymczasowy widok
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_countries
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/countries/'
);

-- 3. Przygotowanie danych – JOIN + wybór najnowszych po customer_id
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW new_bronze_d_customers AS
SELECT 
    c.customer_id,
    c.country_id,
    c.company_name,
    c.address,
    c.city,
    co.region_description,
    co.country,
    co.cluster,
    c.update_date as customer_update_date,
    co.update_date as country_update_date
FROM bronze_customers c
JOIN bronze_countries co
  ON c.country_id = co.country_id;

-- 4. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej jako Delta Lake (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.d_customers
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
AS
SELECT * FROM new_bronze_d_customers
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- 5. Filtrowanie nowych lub zaktualizowanych rekordów
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_bronze_d_customers AS
SELECT * FROM new_bronze_d_customers n 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM silver.d_customers s 
  WHERE s.customer_id = n.customer_id
    AND s.country_id = n.country_id
    AND s.customer_update_date = n.customer_update_date
    AND s.country_update_date = n.country_update_date
);

-- 6. MERGE (UPSERT)
MERGE INTO silver.d_customers AS target
USING filter_bronze_d_customers AS source
ON target.customer_id = source.customer_id

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    country_id = source.country_id,
    company_name = source.company_name,
    address = source.address,
    city = source.city,
    region_description = source.region_description,
    country = source.country,
    cluster = source.cluster,
    customer_update_date = source.customer_update_date,
    country_update_date = source.country_update_date

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    customer_id,
    country_id,
    company_name,
    address,
    city,
    region_description,
    country,
    cluster,
    customer_update_date,
    country_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.customer_id,
    source.country_id,
    source.company_name,
    source.address,
    source.city,
    source.region_description,
    source.country,
    source.cluster,
    source.customer_update_date,
    source.country_update_date

--D_PRODUCTS_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- ============================================
-- 1. Rejestracja danych z Bronze jako tymczasowy widok
-- ============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_products
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/products'
);

-- ============================================
-- 2. Wybór najnowszych danych wg update_date
-- ============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW new_d_products AS
SELECT 
    product_id,
    product_name,
    brand_name,
    sub_brand_name,
    category_name,
    update_date AS product_update_date
FROM bronze_products;

-- ============================================
-- 3. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej (Silver) jeśli nie istnieje
-- ============================================

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.d_products
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products'
AS
SELECT * FROM new_d_products
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- Filtrowanie nowych lub zaktualizowanych rekordów
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_d_products AS
SELECT * FROM new_d_products n 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM silver.d_products s 
  WHERE s.product_id = n.product_id 
    AND s.product_update_date = n.product_update_date
);

-- ============================================
-- 4. MERGE INTO (UPSERT) danych do tabeli Silver
-- ============================================

MERGE INTO silver.d_products AS target
USING filter_d_products AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.product_name = source.product_name,
    target.brand_name = source.brand_name,
    target.sub_brand_name = source.sub_brand_name,
    target.category_name = source.category_name,
    target.product_update_date = source.product_update_date

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id,
    product_name,
    brand_name,
    sub_brand_name,
    category_name,
    product_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id,
    source.product_name,
    source.brand_name,
    source.sub_brand_name,
    source.category_name,
    source.product_update_date);
